diff.q: How is GymBud different from other AI fitness apps?
diff.a: Other apps roll the dice. We use a deterministic engine + adaptive coach: same inputs, same plan, real adjustments in-session.

busy_gym.q: What if my gym is busy and equipment is taken?
busy_gym.a: Ask the coach to swap instantly — you'll get alternatives that match your goals without breaking flow.

injuries.a: Yes. Flag them and GymBud will prescribe safe variants for knees, shoulders, back, and more.

data.q: Do I lose my history if I cancel?
data.a: No. Your data stays yours. Export anytime and keep it forever.

accuracy.q: How accurate is the AI coach?
accuracy.a: It only acts within safe, evidence-based parameters — adjustments are always rational, not random.

ptbr.a: Yes. GymBud is fully available in EN and PT-BR.
